message.entry: ''SamplePoints'' argument is required when the window size is a duration.
Elements of the ''SamplePoints'' cell array must be vectors.
Sample points vectors must be numeric, datetime, or duration.
Sample points vectors must be in ascending order and contain no duplicates.
''SamplePoints'' value must be a two-element cell array.
Window size and sample points types for grid dimension {0} are not compatible.
Sample points vector corresponding to grid dimension {0} must contain {1} elements - the size of the input data in that dimension.
Window size must be a scalar value or a cell array.
A cell array indicating window size must contain scalar or two-element vector values.
A cell array indicating window size must contain numeric or duration values.
Window size must be a numeric or duration scalar, or a cell array of numeric or duration values or vectors.
Scalar window sizes must be real, finite, and positive.
Vector window sizes must contain only real, finite, and nonnegative values.
